name: Wake Me Up (Interactive music clip)
description:
So this is not really a game, it's a musical clip.

Use the ARROW KEYS LEFT, UP AND RIGHT to change the visuals. Play with those to manipulate what you're seeing and make it dynamic as you wish.

I'm dumb and lazy so use alt-f4 to exit.

Music : Para One - Wake Me Up
I totally don't own the rights but music is made for sharing, just like this project that is a tribute to an artist I love.

Website : maelpichois.fr

Peace.
